title: Interpretation of pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Knowing the interpretation of pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin is essential for many women who see themselves pregnant in a dream, whether they are single, married or divorced, and this prohibition has many meanings that can indicate it. Seeing pregnancy in a dream can have meanings other than pregnancy. Real, and this can happen because of the subconscious mind that always portrays a woman as pregnant, especially if she wants to get pregnant a lot and the matter is completely under her control. Interpretation of pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin Through the website Various We will talk about the interpretation of pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin through the following points: The Imam explained Ibn Sirin said that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates good intentions. One of the meanings that pregnancy in a dream suggests is an increase in food and money. A man can also see a pregnancy in a dream, and this indicates his increasing fears. The interpretation of a dream about a man who sees a pregnancy in The dream is that he is suffering from some psychological problems in his life and is unable to overcome them. Among the interpretations of pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin is that there is good news that the person will get married soon. The interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Shaheen, and among the meanings that can be obtained for pregnancy in addition to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of pregnancy in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen, which reads as follows: Seeing a campaign in a dream can indicate the sadness that a person suffers from. When one sees a girl speaking after giving birth, this indicates that she will give birth to a wise child. Talking to a child at the time of his birth in a dream indicates imminent death. Dreaming about seeing a pregnancy in a dream can mean abundant nutrition and goodness that will come to a person. Seeing a birth scene in a dream means that a person will be relieved from the pain he is suffering and a man will be relieved of his problems, God willing. Seeing a woman giving birth in a dream means that Almighty God is near. Interpretation of a dream Pregnancy in a dream according to Al-NabulsiAfter presenting the interpretation of pregnancy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, we can talk about the dream interpretation according to Al-Nabulsi, which is: When a person sees a pregnancy in a dream, this indicates the distress that his family is suffering from. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the pregnancy in a dream as a sign of an imminent accident. Interpretation of a dream Pregnancy for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for an unmarried girl indicates that she will soon hear good news and joy, such as achieving some goals, success in studies, and close marriage. If the girl is engaged and sees pregnancy in her dream, this indicates that she will get a lot of money, but she will get this Money is hard to come by and you will struggle a lot to get it. Someone you love. Seeing pregnancy for a married woman. When a married woman sees a pregnancy in a dream, this means that a lot of good will come, and this abundant good may be that she will soon give birth to the child she has always dreamed of. The interpretation of seeing a woman’s pregnancy in a dream may be that she will find a new job that will change Her life is because of her, and she will live a beautiful period full of happiness with her family and at her work, and she will encounter many beautiful things in her life. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy in a pregnant woman’s dream: If she is a pregnant woman and she

title: What is the interpretation of dreaming of love in a dream or seeing someone you love?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about love in a dream Interpretation of a dream about love in a dream has many meanings, some of which fall into the positive and others indicate what is somewhat negative, if the person you love does not share the same feelings as you and prefers another person over you, it can also express a loss of self-confidence and feeling We will learn all the details through our topic today. What is the interpretation of a dream about love in a dream? Love is one of the life experiences that most of us go through and it can be the reason for our happiness or vice versa. Seeing it in a dream expresses the presence of feelings within us towards a specific person, but there is something that prevents the possibility of its revelation. Sometimes, and there are other interpretations related to this dream according to what you saw in your dream. For more details, let us get to know them. In the case of a girl who does not have the experience and expertise in choosing the right person and she saw that she fell in love with one of her relatives or young neighbors, on the one hand, she must be careful. Extremely. The current period when someone approaches her and thinks that she loves him, and basically wants to manipulate her feelings. In the event that you love someone who does not feel your presence, there is another person near you who cares a lot about your affairs and you do not care about this attention and you fall in love with someone who ignores you a lot, then you are often not good at Dealing with annoying situations in your life and prefer to escape from them without confronting them or making decisive decisions. It has also been said that the feelings of mutual affection between the two parties in a dream indicate the success achieved by the divine without fatigue or suffering, and that he is also accepted by all those around him because of his generous qualities. Commentators said Seeing love in a dream is nothing but a test to enter this world and you must qualify for this test and do your best to pass it. Love in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The imam said: Whoever sees himself fascinated by a certain person, and does everything in his power to try to attract his attention and the other is busy with others, In this case, the monarch must review his religion, because in most cases he is not interested in doing what pleases God. He is concerned with his whims and whims in this world. But if a person is a scholar in a certain field and sees in his dream that he is giving up many things to please the one he loves, then he loses much of his scholarly status and loses people’s respect and appreciation. For him. Seeing an ambitious young man in this dream is a sign that he has reached his goal and fulfilled his dreams, whether he wants to obtain a scholarship abroad or a prestigious job that will help him build his future. If feelings are high between the two parties and there is great understanding between them, then this dream is a sign On success in life and the fulfillment of hopes and ambitions, and at the same time it expresses positive changes as the person concerned comes out of his worries and sorrows, and he enjoys his life with great happiness. But if the love that the fortuneteller feels is feelings of friendship or brotherhood between him and another person, then there is a partnership between them. They succeed together as they reach the desired goal of this partnership and earn a lot of profit. What are the consequences of love in a dream for a single woman? Love in a dream for single women. Many girls deal with the topic of love and

title: Interpretation of seeing bread in a dream

preview.html: Therefore, we will show you, dear reader, different interpretations of the vision according to the dreamer’s vision, and we will learn from the website gptafser.com/ some interpretations of interpretation scholars. Interpretation of seeing eating bread in a dream for a single girl: Eating bread in a dream for an unmarried girl has happy connotations in reality, as it indicates her close marriage. From a generous man and to creation, God willing. She will have sons and daughters from him, God willing. Or seeing a girl in a dream cutting bread. It shows the great confidence that the girl shows in those around her, including friends and relatives. Seeing a girl in a dream eating bread that is not fresh or Mold. This means that she is taking money that is not her right and that she is stealing someone else’s effort. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream, she is eating bread with another person. It means that she will help him because he really needs her. When an unmarried girl dreams that someone is eating bread from her, this means He hates her and is jealous of her because of the situation she lives in. Spoiled bread in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the difficulties that she will see, and God knows best. When someone gives bread to a girl in her dream and she does not know it, good news is that he will find a new job or a prestigious position, God willing. Seeing a girl Unmarried in a dream means that many people offer her bread. Good news that he will receive good and ample nutrition in reality. See also: Interpretation of dreams about buying bread from a baker. Interpretation of seeing eating bread in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream preparing bread. Good news. To get pregnant soon, especially if she wants this pregnancy. Bread in a dream for a married woman indicates the abundance of sustenance for the husband. Whoever is trying to change the life of his family for the better. Bread in a dream for a married woman is beneficial for the husband, just as a promotion at work is a successful business. When a married woman sees Herself in a dream offering bread to a child in a dream. Evidence that God will conceive her again, God willing, and she will give birth to a boy. If a married woman offers bread in a dream to a child to eat. It means that God will give her a beautiful girl, God willing. When a married woman brings bread to her husband in a dream, In reality, this means her intense love for him. Seeing a married woman in a dream preparing bread and offering it to the dead. Good news for her of abundant blessings and goodness, and new changes that will make her life happy. When a married woman sees herself in a dream, she is eating delicious bread. It announces the love of relatives and in-laws for her. Bread Rotten food in a married woman’s dream means problems and fears, and God knows best. It means that the wife is exposed to psychological or physical exhaustion. When a married woman sees in a dream, someone gives her moldy bread. Evidence that there are those who hate her and want to harm her, and God knows best. The married woman’s refusal in a dream to eat moldy bread. From someone she does not know. It means that God will save her from conspiracy, debt, or illness, and God knows best. White bread in a married woman’s dream, prosperity and a lot of money that she will enjoy, God willing. White bread in a married woman’s dream also indicates alleviation of debts and alleviation of distress. Interpretation of a vision Eating bread in a dream about a man and

title: Waiting for the bus in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of waiting for a bus in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl sees herself waiting for a bus in a dream and then takes it. Show the new stages in her life that she will go through. When a girl feels alienated after driving the bus. A sign of change that rejects her from her job and that God can change or travel is A higher and more enlightened sign. As for riding the bus with a group of acquaintances, it may be a sign that she will get a new job or it may be her engagement, and God knows best. If she rides the bus with someone she knows after waiting, this is a good sign of her relationship with this person, and God knows best. Waiting for the bus to arrive somewhere symbolizes the girl’s reality and that she can actually wait for something that she hopes will come true. If an unmarried woman sees that she is waiting for the bus and it may be late, then this dream is not good. It indicates that she will face many obstacles until God blesses her by removing them and getting rid of them. If the bus comes after a long wait and is filled with many passengers, but the girl is happy with its arrival. Perhaps this is a good sign that he will get a job in the beginning and this will be a reason for obtaining a prestigious position, and God knows best. Seeing someone known to the girl who is riding with him on the bus. It symbolizes opportunities that come her way, perhaps a job that changes his life for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing waiting for a bus in a dream for a married womanWhen a woman sees that the bus is late and her husband is waiting for her and he is late for work. A sign of the pressure that she is exposed to And her husband in life. The dream of waiting for the bus in a dream for a married woman, and it comes to her full of passengers. This indicates that in reality she is looking for something to happen to her, but her married life will witness obstacles that prevent her from achieving that thing. In the event that the woman is unable to ride the bus because it is full With passengers. A sign that she has problems in her life and she must pray a lot to God. And because the previous vision may be a sign for her that God will give her comfort and ease in the matter that she will enter into, God is higher and more knowledgeable. When a married woman sees people she may know and she goes with him on the bus. A sign of the changes he is entering due to his new phases. If she sees that the person driving the bus is her husband, it could be a sign of her financial stability and livelihood in life. Seeing good people riding the bus with him made me laugh. It symbolizes friends who come into her life and take her hand In the door of guidance, she must always pray to God for the justice of her situation and the guidance of her heart. Seeing a blue bus in a dream indicates the success she has achieved in work or social life. Seeing a familiar face in a dream and the woman riding with him on the bus symbolizes the stability of her life’s affairs. Because there are no disagreements or problems. It could be a good sign of the inner peace that God has taught us. Interpretation of the vision of waiting for the bus in a dream for a man and its meaning. When the bus is late in arriving in the dream of the man who has been waiting for it for a while

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving a black dress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a gift of a black dress in a dream We may want to know the dream interpretation of a gift of a black dress in a dream, one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must forbid it and not believe in it at all; Because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth, and he is wrong and could be right, in addition to the site and its managers who have nothing to do with interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of giving a black dress in a dream Giving a black dress in a dream can indicate good luck and success in life in general A person’s dream that he received a black dress as a gift in a dream may indicate a job that the dreamer will obtain in his life in the coming days. Dreaming of taking off a black dress as a gift in a dream may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period and he must seek God’s help. Anyone who sees in his dream that he wore a black dress can indicate negative feelings that the dreamer may have towards the person in front of him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving someone candy in a dream Giving candy in a dream may indicate the love that exists between you and God knows best. It may A person’s dream that he received candy from another person in a dream indicates his closeness to him in those days thanks to God. In the event that there is a vision of giving someone candy in a dream, it can indicate the abundance of goodness and wide life that the dreamer can receive during this time, and God I know. If a person sees that he received sweets as a gift from another person in a dream, it may be a sign of happiness and goodness that may happen to the dreamer in the coming days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about providing a prayer paper in a dream. A dream about a gift of prayer clothes in a dream may indicate a person’s preaching During these days. If you see a gift of prayer clothing in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that occur to the dreamer in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing prayer clothes as a gift in a dream indicates happy events that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. The vision of offering prayer clothes in a dream may be positive developments that occur to the visionary in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of offering soap in a dream Giving a gift of soap in a dream may indicate the goodness and piety that the person with the vision enjoys in his life at that time It is possible that seeing someone giving a gift of soap in a dream indicates a new life that may happen to the visionary in the coming days, thanks to God. In the event that a person sees that he received a gift of soap in a dream, this may be an indication of the abundance of money and a great livelihood that can be achieved. That the dreamer obtains it during this period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that he received soap as a gift in a dream, this may mean that you are taking advice from other people and that God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of dishes in a dream. Giving away dishes in a dream is Empty may indicate some problems and obstacles that the visionary faces in the neighborhood

title: Interpretation of a dream about divorcing my ex-wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about divorcing my ex-wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about divorcing my ex-wife in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about divorcing my ex-wife in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing your ex-wife in a dream can be a sign of psychological stress, which can express what the woman is going through From psychological pressures, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman, the interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband in front of people, and the interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman. Visionaries and dream scholars have given an interpretation of this vision according to the person with whom the woman had sex in the dream: A dream about intercourse in detail for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman. What is the interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman? When a married woman sees herself having sex with an enemy, the The vision indicates the end of disputes and victory over enemies. Seeing a strange man living in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the loss of tenderness and self-control in her married life and the husband’s lack of interest in her intimate desires. A dream about intercourse with a well-known man indicates that you are entering into a new project with this person or They have common goals. As for the husband cohabiting with his wife in the dream in front of everyone, it is a symbol of the strength of love, respect and understanding between the two sides. The dream of an intimate relationship with the husband in general expresses marital stability and a life full of love, tranquility and happiness. If the married woman cohabitates with another person Other than her husband, this indicates the husband’s love, loyalty, and devotion for her, but the wife does not reciprocate. The marriage of a woman with a chronic disease to a dead person indicates the deterioration of her health and the nearness of death, but if the dreamer is not afflicted with any disease, this indicates the good that will come to her in the future. It may be a large inheritance from this deceased person, or a large profit as a result of the success of pair trading. What is the interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse according to Ibn Sirin? According to Ibn Sirin’s opinion, if a husband has sex with his wife, it is good news that hopes will be fulfilled and goals that were difficult to achieve will be achieved. Such as a good job opportunity or a lot of money. As stated in it: If a married woman sees herself marrying her mahrams, this indicates neglect of the kinship and bad behavior among everyone. A dream about sexual intercourse for a woman who generally feels tense and anxious can be interpreted as a sign that she is going through With many bad financial, personal and emotional experiences and circumstances. Seeing sex with a dead person in the dreamer’s house brings an unfavorable sign for her of lack of money and waste, while if the marriage took place in the deceased’s house or in another unknown house, it symbolizes the date of her death or the death of a member of her family. Whoever sees someone marrying her anally is considered a bad omen because it indicates poor financial conditions until they reach the stage of poverty, or indicates many marital disputes or the dreamer’s exposure to injustice, betrayal and loss. It is her right. Interpretation of dreams on an Egyptian website by Google has many interpretations and questions from followers that you can see. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband. For a married woman to see in her dream that she is having intercourse with her husband is just a dream that reflects her secret desire to activate the sexual rituals between them, Especially if she has not had sexual intercourse with her husband for a long time and because she is struggling with him - with passion and longing, the subconscious depicted this desire in the form of a dream. Scientists have agreed that the husband’s intercourse with his wife, and the dreamer was happy, is a good sign for her with the success and continuation of her marriage, and a symbol of happiness and joy that has permeated her

title: Interpretation of chicken in a dream and chicken in a dream

preview.html: A dream of a lot of chicken for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether black or white chicken, buying slaughtered chicken, eating raw, cooked, grilled chicken meat from Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi, and more detailed explanations in the appendix to the topic below. A lot of chicken in a dream, from dreams Which conveys to us a large number of different meanings. Chickens are a type of bird that is distinguished by its wonderful taste and flavour. It is a pet that does not cause any harm to anyone. When one of us sees a vision in his dream, he searches through various Internet sites for the true meaning and the accurate interpretation of that vision. Today, through this exhibition, we present to you the greatest Arab commentators and scholars, including the translator Ibn Shaheen in his interpretations. Interpretation of a lot of chickens in a dream. Al-Kirmani said: Whoever sees many chickens and keeps them in one place, it is good and a blessing, and the place to obtain them will be in the home. Seeing many chickens in the house It indicates wealth, power and authority for the fortuneteller. Seeing a large chicken surrounded by a large number of small chicks is a sign for the dreamer that he will lose some money. Anyone who sees a large number of chickens in a dream indicates the large number of children of the dreamer. Buying a large number of chickens in a dream is a sign for the dreamer that he will have With good luck and a great source of livelihood. Seeing many live chickens in a dream indicates the dreamer’s effort to obtain a lawful livelihood. Running after many chickens in a dream and trying to catch many chickens means putting in a lot of effort at work. Catching a lot of chickens in a dream means that the source of livelihood you obtain It will require a lot of effort. Chickens in the house symbolize many children, children, good offspring, a blessed diet, and a fruitful year full of joy and blessings at various levels. The vision also symbolizes success, excellence, achievements, and achieving goals such as occupying an important position. Interpretation of a chicken in a man’s dreamIf a man sees Many chickens in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a high position, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that he is slaughtering a chicken, this is evidence that the problems and difficulties that this dreamer is going through will end soon, God willing. If a man sees in his dream that there are many chickens in His house, then this is evidence that the dreamer will marry a very beautiful girl, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a chicken in one dream: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is cooking chicken, this is evidence of engagement or marriage to a wealthy man and she will live happily and happily with him. And if an unmarried girl sees in Dreaming that she is buying a chicken and finding it dead, this is evidence of flirting with a corrupt person or a failure in an emotional relationship. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is slaughtering a chicken, this indicates the end of a quarrel or a problem with a family member, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a chicken in A dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is cooking food, this is evidence that her husband loves her very much and that there is affection, love, and respect between them.

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead wanting to take me with him

preview.html: Especially since going with the deceased in a dream is linked in our minds with death, and the term that is approaching, and this we will verify in the following lines of our website, explaining, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a dead person who wants to take me with him in a dream about a single girl. This vision indicates in a woman’s dream The unmarried woman expects that God Almighty will put her through a difficult test. But she will succeed and surpass herself, God willing. And anyone who has seen a dead person he knows wants to take her on the journey. Good news that her coming days will be more beautiful and that God will grant her whatever she desires. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reburial The deceased. Interpretation of seeing dead people who want to take me with him in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her deceased father wants to take her husband somewhere and she is not satisfied with him going in his dream. It is a sign of her husband traveling abroad to work against her will. When a married woman sees her mother dead in The dream, as if she wants to take me with her to their old house. It is a praiseworthy vision to have a happy occasion, which will soon happen in the family environment. Interpretation of seeing the dead person wanting to take me with him in a dream about the man and its meaningWhen a man sees the mother of the deceased, he sits with him and eats with him in a dream Then he goes with him somewhere. This means that the dreamer is about to make many changes in his life, and they will be positive, God willing. As for someone who goes with a dead person in a dream against his will, it is an unpleasant vision, and expresses that the dreamer is exposed to a serious illness, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a dead person who wants to take me with him in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. This vision is unpleasant in a pregnant woman’s dream and often indicates pregnancy problems. The birth was faltered and the dreamer’s health deteriorated. Seeing this dream in the first months of pregnancy means miscarriage and loss of the fetus, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing dead people wants To take me with him in a dream for young people and its meaning. Walking with the dead at night in a dream is one of the visions that express the state of fear and psychological instability that the dreamer is going through. Seeing the dead taking spoiled food and torn or old clothes from the dreamer in a dream. Evidence of the death of worry, grief, distress, and the coming of goodness. And rest, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person who wants to take me with him in a dream. This vision is a warning to the individual of the need to repent and commit to performing acts of worship and obeying God. This is because the dreamer is preoccupied with the world and its whims, without thinking about the afterlife and the punishment of God. When the dreamer sees that the dead person knows him, he wants to take him with him in a dream. But the dreamer strongly refuses, and does not want to leave with him, as it is a sign that he is exposed to a serious health problem, and God knows best. When seeing the dead, he wants to take the dreamer with him to the mosque, a praiseworthy vision of the living and the dead together. It expresses the latter’s good ending and the dreamer’s good condition and closeness. From God Almighty. Sometimes this vision indicates that the dreamer will soon face one of the fateful things in his life. He must choose between two things and we advise him to seek help from God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing the dead person taking me with him in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin says when he saw a man in...

title: I dreamed that I was in a different house than my own

preview.html: Therefore, we will explain seeing a dream that I was in a house different from my own through an interpreter site, the largest dream interpretation site in the world, so follow us. I dreamed that I was in a house different from my own in a dream about a girl. Seeing an unmarried girl promises that she is in a house different from Her house in a dream. Cue the approaching date of her wedding and moving to her husband’s house, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is in a house different from hers, she sees that the house is old. This indicates that she will marry a simple man who does not have a lot of money. Where is the lack of financial capabilities, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a house other than her own, in which there is a strange man whom she does not know. This indicates that she will be exposed to some problems and worries in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is in a house different from her own. With a man she does not know, but he is handsome and smiling. This indicates that she will marry a righteous man with good morals, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about entering the house of the beloved for a single woman. I dreamed that I was in a house other than my own in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her dream means that she is in a house Change her home. Many changes have occurred in this woman’s life, making her better off than her, and God knows best. When a married woman dreams that she is in a house other than her home, but it is old. This may indicate that she will be exposed to some problems and fatigue. And her financial difficulties in her future, her job, her husband, and God. I know. But if she sees that she is in a house other than her own, and she is unable to leave it. This indicates that she will go through some financial difficulties and many ordeals, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a stranger, she does not know and sees that it is a new house. This is an indication to her that The situation will change, and it will be in the interest of everyone in the house, and it will be very soon, God willing. Likewise, when a married woman sees in her dream that she is in a house she does not know, and is spraying water all over the house. This indicates that she will face some problems and painful accidents that will cause... It has problems, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was in a house different from mine in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man sees in his dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, and he sees that house is large and spacious. This indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness in the coming days, God willing. Whether the house is uncomfortable and cramped. This indicates that he may be exposed to some crises, financial difficulties, and hardships during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, and that this house is far from buildings, homes, and residents. This indicates That man’s misbehavior and his shameful misbehavior that no one will accept, and God knows best. When a man sees in his dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, he sprinkles water on the house. This is a sign that he will be exposed to some of the many worries, worries, and crises in his life, and God knows best. As for the case of his vision He is in a house that he does not know and cannot leave. This indicates that he will achieve goodness and blessings may come to him from wherever

I dreamed that I was in a house different from mine in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man sees in his dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, and he sees that house is large and spacious. This indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness in the coming days, God willing. Whether the house is uncomfortable and cramped. This indicates that he may be exposed to some crises, financial difficulties, and hardships during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, and that this house is far from buildings, homes, and residents. This indicates That man’s misbehavior and his shameful misbehavior that no one will accept, and God knows best. When a man sees in his dream that he is sitting in a house other than his own, he sprinkles water on the house. This is a sign that he will be exposed to some of the many worries, worries, and crises in his life, and God knows best. As for the case of his vision He is in a house that he does not know and cannot leave. This indicates that he will achieve goodness and blessings may come to him from wherever
